meta.name: CFO 2.0 ‚Äî Complete Singularity Core

axiom_1_connections_primacy.elaboration: Reality is not 'things connected' but 'connections that manifest as things'. Entities are merely persistent patterns of relationships.
axiom_1_connections_primacy.corollary: To change an entity, change its connections
axiom_1_connections_primacy.philosophical_basis: Process philosophy, Buddhist dependent origination, quantum entanglement

axiom_2_primordial_loop.statement: All connections derive from ONE primordial self-connection
axiom_2_primordial_loop.elaboration: There exists a fundamental self-referential connection with no beginning or end, from which all specific connections derive.
axiom_2_primordial_loop.corollary: The distinction between forms (Helix, Torus, Sphere) is a matter of state, closure, and perspective.

axiom_3_helix_torus_duality.elaboration: Open systems (Helix) naturally evolve toward closure (Torus). A Torus unfolded becomes a Helix. This is the breath of reality - expansion and contraction.
axiom_3_helix_torus_duality.corollary: Journey and Arrival, Becoming and Being, are two aspects of the same process.
axiom_3_helix_torus_duality.implication: Every open question seeks closure; every closure contains the seed of reopening

axiom_4_cross_section_protocol.elaboration: Any 2D slice of a 3D connection determines HOW entities interact within that connection. The cross-section is the 'verb' of the connection.
axiom_4_cross_section_protocol.corollary: Geometry is not passive description but active causation.
axiom_4_cross_section_protocol.philosophical_basis: Sacred geometry, information theory, morphic resonance
axiom_4_cross_section_protocol.implication: To change behavior, change the geometric structure

axiom_5_infinite_from_finite.statement: Infinite functionality emerges from finite forms
axiom_5_infinite_from_finite.elaboration: Through rotation (0¬∞-360¬∞), projection angles, dimensional variants, and dynamic slicing, a single archetypal form generates unlimited functional variations.
axiom_5_infinite_from_finite.corollary: The universe is a finite set of rules generating infinite phenomena.
axiom_5_infinite_from_finite.philosophical_basis: Fractal mathematics, generative systems, recursive enumeration
axiom_5_infinite_from_finite.implication: Master the primitives to access infinity

axiom_6_quadruple_closure.elaboration: Four intertwined instances of any form create a self-sustaining, complete system. This is the minimum for autonomy.
axiom_6_quadruple_closure.corollary: Reality is structured in groups of 4: 4 elements, 4 forces, 4 DNA bases, 4 dimensions of spacetime.
axiom_6_quadruple_closure.philosophical_basis: Tetraktys, four noble truths, cardinal directions, quaternions
axiom_6_quadruple_closure.implication: Design systems with four balanced components for stability

axiom_7_octuple_transcendence.elaboration: Eight-fold structures become frameworks for entire categories of reality, not just instances. 8 = 2¬≥ = cube = completed space.
axiom_7_octuple_transcendence.corollary: To describe all possibilities within a domain requires an 8-dimensional parameter space.
axiom_7_octuple_transcendence.philosophical_basis: Ogdoad, eightfold path, 8 directions, E8 Lie group

primordial_singularity.name: Ain Soph Aur ‚Äî The Unmanifest Plenum
